sen.j: 千田兵衛（せんだ ひょうえ、弘化3年（1846年） - 慶応4年8月21日 (旧暦)（1868年10月6日））は、陸奥国弘前藩出身の新選組隊士。
sen.e: Hyoe SENDA (1846 - Oct 6, 1868) was a member of Shinsengumi (a group who guarded Kyoto during the end of Tokugawa Shogunate) form Hirosaki Domain, Mutsu Province.
Hyoe SENDA (1846 - Oct 6, 1868) was a member of the Shinsengumi (a group who guarded Kyoto during the end of Tokugawa Shogunate) form Hirosaki Domain, Mutsu Province.
sen.cmt: the Shinsengumi に訂正しました。
sen.e: Hyoe SENDA (1846 - Oct 6, 1868) was a member of the Shinsengumi (a group who guarded Kyoto during the end of Tokugawa Shogunate) form Hirosaki Domain, Mutsu Province.
Lower commander of infantry.
sen.cmt: 「歩兵差図役下役」定訳不明です。
sen.e: Lower commander of infantry.
Lower commander of infantry.

sen.j: 慶応3年（1867年）頃、新選組へ入隊。
sen.e: He joined Shinsengumi aroung 1867.
He joined the Shinsengumi in around 1867.
sen.cmt: the Shinsengumi に訂正しました。aroung ⇒ in around に訂正しました。
sen.e: He joined the Shinsengumi in around 1867.

sen.j: 局長近藤勇の側近を務める。
sen.e: He served as a close retainer of Isami KONOD, Head of Shinsengumi.
He served as a close retainer of Isami KONOD, Head of the Shinsengumi.
sen.cmt: the Shinsengumi に訂正しました。
sen.e: He served as a close retainer of Isami KONOD, Head of the Shinsengumi.

sen.j: 戊辰戦争が起こると、鳥羽伏見の戦い、甲州勝沼の戦い、会津戦争に転戦。
sen.e: When the Boshi War started, he fought in the Battle of Toba-Fushimi, The Battle of Koshu-Katsunuma, and the Aizu War.
When the Boshi War started, he fought in the Battle of Toba-Fushimi, The Battle of Koshu-Katsunuma, and the Aizu War.
When the Boshi War started, he fought in the Battle of Toba-Fushimi, The Battle of Koshu-Katsunuma, and the Aizu War.

sen.j: 母成峠の戦いで戦死した。
sen.e: He was killed on the field of the Battle of Bonari-toge.
He was killed on the field of the Battle of Bonari-toge.
He was killed on the field of the Battle of Bonari-toge.
Died at 23.
He died at 23.
He died at 23.
